Html: With the amount of updates the developers have been doing to RAWR 3.0 lately, any word on updating the web version testing? I know Ast has said that he seldomly updates it but the amount of work that has been going on the last few weeks to RAWR 3 has be exponential.
I'll post a new version in the next day or two.

I'm about 2/3 of the way done with the Feral DPS guide movie (clocking in at about 15-20minutes right now) which will heavily plug Rawr. I'd love to plug the Rawr3 website but won't unless I see some announcement about open beta or somesuch before I'm ready to release the movie - which should be in about 1-2 weeks.

Aaaaargh.

 

Then again, I can't tell you how bloody happy I am that this is happening at all. There'll be a [PLACEHOLDER]. You'll laugh.

Re: Deleted post that was just above this.

Well don't post it here.
Do not give out links to Rawr3 yet, please. If your friends want to beta test it too, tell them to contact me.
